description: Kathleen Arthur is a portrait painter best known for her YOU GO, GIRL collection-an empowering series that celebrates women through striking, vintage-inspired imagery. Each piece features anonymous women dressed to the hilt while engaging in everyday tasks, paired with clever double entendre titles that highlight the many facets of women's personalities. By inviting viewers to imagine themselves or a loved one in the scene, Kathleen's work creates an intimate and interactive connection with collectors.With a focus on capable women and universal storytelling, Kathleen's art blends elegance, humor, and strength. She is an active member of several artist organizations and is currently represented by the Tucson Gallery and Paloma Art Gallery.For this auction, Kathleen has generously donated an original 24 x 30 acrylic painting titled Show Stopper from the YOU GO, GIRL collection. The piece features a glamorous woman in classic 1950s attire, offering a steaming bag of popcorn-an irresistible mix of charm, nostalgia, and empowerment.

description: Celebrate the vision of  Jack Eggman, acclaimed Tucson artist , with this extraordinary original art piece. Jack Eggman, a third generation Arizonian descended from copper miners, transformed his heritage into art by pioneering copper-inlaid monotypes - a medium that unites the raw power of primal art with the structural elegance of cubism . Each piece reflects both his personal story and Tucson's cultural roots, resulting in work that is as meaningful as it is visually striking. This is a rare opportunity to acquire a one-of-a-kind piece from a contemporary artist whose vision and craftsmanship continue to inspire and captivate.
title: Copper Artwork in Metal Frame by Local Artist Jack Eggman 35 x 48

description: Jack Eggman is a highly skilled artist from Southern Arizona who brings a unique and personal touch to his artwork by incorporating copper into his pieces. description: Indulge in the rich and robust flavors of the 2023 1858 Paso Robles Cabernet by Caymus in Napa.
